column1: The deadline to apply for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program (CFAP) is August 28th. Find out more information here: https://t.co/zh2lBL17pE.
COVID-19 Arkansas guidance and resources for getting tested: https://t.co/xzZNYVqXRy
If someone knocks on your door and offers to provide you with a COVID-19 test tell them no then contact the attorney general’s office: https://t.co/p4YdWuxJCk
